Various improvements performance improvements and bug fixes.

Upgrade to Premium - get new opportunities and options:
- Tracking map
- No ads
- Widget with altitude on the home screen
- Analog drum-type aircraft altimeter
- Full history and archives of measurements
- Location and coordinates placed on the photo
- No EXA watermark on the photo
- Sunrise and sunset time
